net.truelicense.api.codec.Decoder

  • Packages that use Decoder 
    Package Description
    net.truelicense.api.auth
    Provides authentication services.
    net.truelicense.api.codec
    Provides object graph encoding/decoding services (alias serialization).

    Provides authentication services.
    net.truelicense.spi.codec
    Provides object graph encoding/decoding services (alias serialization).
    net.truelicense.v1.codec
    Provides object graph encoding/decoding services using XML.
    net.truelicense.v2.json.codec
    Provides object graph encoding/decoding services using JSON.
    net.truelicense.v2.xml.codec
    Provides object graph encoding/decoding services using XML.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Decoder Authentication.sign(RepositoryController repository, Object artifact)
      Encodes and signs the given artifact and returns a decoder for it.
      Decoder RepositoryController.sign(Signature engine, Object artifact)
      Encodes and signs the given artifact and returns a decoder for it.
      Decoder Authentication.verify(RepositoryController repository)
      Verifies the signature of the encoded artifact in the underlying repository model and returns a decoder for it.
      Decoder RepositoryController.verify(Signature engine)
      Verifies the signature of the encoded artifact in the underlying repository model and returns a decoder for it.
